condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Human resources Capacities Available for Education programme effectiveness

description.narrative:
UNICEF Sudan recruited education staff members and consultants to support the effective implementation of the UNICEF education program. These staff are of different levels and specialties and are based in Khartoum and all UNICEF field offices in Sudan.
21 staff members are currently onboard within the education program with only 2 vacant positions. Regarding gender parity, 11 of the 21 staff members are women (52%), while for geographic parity 16 are national staff members and 3 of the 5 international staff members are from program countries | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
